title: An individual agreement shall be entered into by the owner / developer / co-operative housing society / NGO with the eligible hutment-dwellers in the slum / pavement
clause_text: An individual agreement shall be entered into by the owner / developer / co-operative housing society / NGO with the eligible hutment-dwellers in the slum / pavement.
